message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $130. I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I'm not willing to go above that.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. I understand your offer of $100, but I'm looking for a little more for this unique item. How about $120? I'm willing to meet you halfway to make this happen.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far from $120. I'm willing to meet you at $110. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial price.
